recipesJson.name: Not another tobacco vape
recipesJson.author: Daytimefrank1
recipesJson.description: My first attempt at a tobacco recipe. The Kentucky Blend is strong and hearty and is in the forefront off the shake. The RY4 and vanilla round it out.

reviews.text: Well crafted recipe and a selection of some of my favorites blended very well, That pistachio puts another level on this tobacco! Thanks for this one Frank, I Laak it Alot!!
Looks like a good take on Charlie's pistachio ry4 nice
